name: Ghostrick Devil of Trickery
text:
2 Level 4 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Ghostrick" Xyz Monster you control as the Xyz Material, except "Ghostrick Devil of Trickery". (Xyz Materials attached to that monster also become Xyz Materials on this card.) Cannot be used as Xyz Material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; change 1 monster on the field to face-down Defence Position. Once per turn: You can attach 1 banished "Ghostrick" card to this card as an Xyz Material.
